DOC.brief_summary: This review article include ten thousand patient undergo percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) , aim identify incidence CIN actual , find new risk factor protect method factor .
DOC.brief_title: Contrast-induced Nephropathy : Incidence , Risk Factors , Effective Prevention Management Method
DOC.detailed_description: About ten thousand patient undergo percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) 2010 2015 include study . We collect data SCr patient percutaneous coronary intervention , define CIN increase SCr 0.5 mg/dl 25 % baseline 48 72 h contrast medium exposure . Besides obtain data include clinical characteristic , laboratory data ( blood urine test ) patient . The statistical analysis find new risk factor .
DOC.criteria: 1. congestive heart failure : objective evidence decrease leave ventricular eject fraction ( LVEF ) < = 50 % ; 2. moderate severe chronic kidney disease define eGFR 15 59 mL/min per 1.73 m2 , calculate via abbreviate Modification Diet Renal Disease ( MDRD ) study equation SCr obtain within 72 hour enrollment ; 3. patient schedule undergo diagnostic cardiac angiography percutaneous coronary intervention . 1. hemodialysisdependent patient ; 2. complicate severe shortterm progressive disease ; 3 . Patients < 18 year ; 4. pregnancy ; 5. emergency cardiac catheterisation ( eg , primary percutaneous coronary intervention STsegment elevation myocardial infarction ) ; 6. exposure radiographic contrast medium within previous 7 day ; 7. acute decompensated heart failure .
